flawed_nl_solution:
In 5 years, Heath will be 16 + 5 = <<16+5=18>>18 years old.
In 5 years, Jude will be 18 / 3 = <<18/3=6>>6 years old.
The difference in their ages is 18 - 6 = <<18-6=12>>12 years.
Today, Jude will be 16 - 12 = <<16-12=4>>4 years old.
